name: Reina
description: Part of series "Guararé" - Queens are an integral part of Panamanian celebrations. In festivals, such as Guararé's Festival de la Mejorana, there is a Festival-wide yearly Queen, but also Queens of schools, community groups, companies, and dance troupes. Love for traditions is passed from one generation to the next, and each artifact (head dress, jewelry, etc.) has meaningful connections to Panamanian history and beliefs.
